name: Twitter UI Kit
description:
Hello Figmates!


Up for download is an unofficial social media app kit inspired by Twitter. This includes:


  1. Neatly organized layers & pages
  2. 40+ responsive components
  3. Light and Dark modes
  4. Atomic design
  5. Auto-layout & Variants
  6. 8+ core screens
  7. Typescale & Color system


Enjoy!
